about_the_game:
Train and Tame is an adult visual novel where you step into the shoes of a personal trainer at an elite fitness club for wealthy women. As you guide your clients through their fitness routines, you’ll soon discover that their desires go far beyond just physical exercise. Your job isn’t just about shaping their bodies; it’s also about satisfying their hidden cravings and bringing their wildest fantasies to life. Charm your way through luxurious encounters and seductive scenarios, navigating the world of high-end desires and erotic indulgences.

The game offers an immersive experience where each choice you make impacts the unfolding story, leading to various steamy outcomes and intimate moments. Whether you're building a professional relationship or escalating things into something much more, every session can take unexpected turns.

Features:

  • Explicit Adult Scenes: Enjoy detailed, uncensored erotic moments designed for mature audiences.

  • Stunning Artwork: Visuals that bring every character and scenario to life in breathtaking detail.

  • High-Quality Illustrations: Gorgeous, hand-drawn scenes full of emotion and passion.

  • Atmospheric Soundtrack: Set the mood with an immersive score that complements every situation.

  • Interactive Choices: Shape your story through dialogue and decisions that affect the outcome.

For adult players only, Train and Tame delivers a unique blend of fitness, seduction, and luxurious fantasy, wrapped in an engaging narrative.
